alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 09 at 12:11PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of East Arkansas and West Tennessee, including the following counties, in East Arkansas, Mississippi. In West Tennessee, Lauderdale. * WHEN...Until 315 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1211 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Osceola, Luxora, Wilson, Keiser, Fort Pillow State Park, Burdette, Marie, Fulton, Victoria, Chilson, Rotan, Sans Souci, Grider, Moran, Driver, Carson Lake, Keyes Port, Red Line, Hilton and Shippen. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
